nodes.text: Rethen was the predominant gas in the atmosphere of the gas giant Bespin. It had a faintly sweet smell, comparable to that of pancakes drenched with syrup, and was only midly toxic to human lungs.

Rethen first appeared in the 1980 movie Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, the second installement in the original trilogy of Star Wars. However, it was first identified as such in Adam Gidwitz's The Empire Strikes Back: So You Want to Be a Jedi?, a retelling of the movie that was released on September 22, 2015.
